name: BridgeDDS
description:
You are an ambitious bridge player? You would like to verify the results of Your played boards?
BridgeDDS will analyze this boards!
The "optimum contract" and the number of tricks made in various contracts is shown. The board can be played interactively to analyse various strategies to play the board. The makeable scores for each legally playable cards and the optimal play of the remaining cards are shown.
The analyses and the interactive play is based on Bo Haglund's "Double Dummy Solver".
